*Nikolay Malkovsky*

*St. Petersburg State University*, 2013-2017

## Research Areas

My research interests and professional work span:

- **Algorithmic Optimization** - Performance-critical systems, finite automata, graph algorithms
- **Network Protocols** - QUIC protocol improvements, congestion control algorithms
- **Coding Theory** - Forward error correction codes, Reed-Solomon codes, convolutional codes
- **ASR Systems** - HMM-DNN hybrid systems, end-to-end ASR, transformer-based approaches
- **Distributed Systems** - Multiagent systems, randomized algorithms, resource distribution
